value:
$WmMPID_風部族フウガ,ch05_65_Fuuga_M_Wind01,Face|You two look rather out of sorts. Do
my tribe's festivities trouble you for
some reason?$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Fuga! Of course not. We were just
taking a moment to remember
Lady Mikoto, that's all.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族フウガ,ch05_65_Fuuga_M_Wind01,Face|I met her through Sumeragi. She was
a wonderful person.$k$pAt times, however, she could be
a touch...$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Absent-minded?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族フウガ,ch05_65_Fuuga_M_Wind01,Face|Thank you. I would have felt uncouth
to be the one to say it.$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Hehehe. I don't think it would have
offended her to hear.$k$pPerhaps you could tell us a little of
your experience with her? It'd be
nice to have your perspective.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Bahaha! She actually mistook you for
Sumeragi? Even with sand in her eyes
you'd think she'd know her husband!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Hahaha... Wow...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族フウガ,ch05_65_Fuuga_M_Wind01,Face|Silly as the story may be, she would
surely be glad to know it made the
two of you smile.$k$p$Sbs150|
